name: PhotoShoot
description:
Retired photographer ventures into a forest in search of one last great photo.

Keyboard and mouse controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Jump: Space bar
  • Take camera out: Hold the right mouse button
  • Take photo: Left mouse click with the camera out
  • Open and close photo album: Tab
  • Close game: Alt+F4

Xbox controller:

  • Move: Left stick
  • Aim: Right stick
  • Jump: A Button
  • Take camera out: Hold the right trigger
  • Take photo: Left trigger with the camera out
  • Open and close photo album: Y button

Developed by:

  • Alan Gaspar
  • Monica Murillo

(We will try to reduce the download size soon!)
